name: Feraligatr
author: Kurata So
flavor_text: It usually moves slowly, but it goes at blinding speed when it attacks and bites prey.

abilities.name: Torrential Heart
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may put 5 damage counters on this Pokémon. If you do, during this turn, attacks used by this Pokémon do 120 more damage to your opponent’s Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Giant Wave
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can’t use Giant Wave.
